title: Test grid for newsletters?
body:
![Caroo](/images/uploads/carine-roitfeld.jpg) [Caroline's Portfolio](www.google.com) Drew McLellan writes about the state of the HTML5 input types in 2019, which can be used, and which should still be avoided. [Read it](www.google.com)
![Fevered](/images/uploads/fevered-sleep.jpg) [Fevered Sleep](www.google.com) Drew McLellan writes about the state of the HTML5 input types in 2019, which can be used, and which should still be avoided. [Read it](www.google.com)
